div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1 Matala environs, port of Phaestus, Crete, 1943 Burial: c. 550-525 B.C. (Holloway) Contents: 71 AR. Pot hoard Aegina: 70 st. Disposition: Oxford 69 (68 Aegina, 1 Thera), casts (2 Aegina) Dunbabin, BSA 42 (1947), p. 192 Brown, NC 1950, p. 186 Kraay, JHS 1964, p. 79 Le Rider, Monn. crét., p. 168 † Holloway, ANSMN 17 (1971), pp. 1-21, illus.
